summary:
Argentina is a large country in South America, located in the southern half of the continent. It is the eighth-largest country in the world and shares borders with Chile, Bolivia, Paraguay, Brazil, Uruguay, and the South Atlantic Ocean. The capital is Buenos Aires.

People have lived in Argentina since the Stone Age. The country was once part of the Spanish empire and gained independence in the early 19th century. It has a rich history with various cultural influences, including from European immigrants. Argentina is a powerful nation with a strong economy and is known for its role in international affairs.
title: Argentina
